server module

server.alphanumeric(number)

This function allows to generate an alphanumeric text

Parameters

number – int – Number of characters in the expected text

Returns

str – Text of number alphanumeric characters

server.bonjour()

This route only allows you to test that the server is active at the address: http://0.0.0.0:5000/bonjour

server.get_image(filename)
server.send_image()

This method is the main method, it is called when the server receives a request. The method calls the ObjectDetection class in order to analyze and make calculations on the received image.

Returns

json – { calculated_image_path, coins_total, execution_time }
